titles: A fountain of gardens watered by the rivers of divine pleasure, and springing up in all the variety of spiritual plants; blown up the pure breath into a paradise, sending forth their sweet savours, and strong odours, for soul-refreshing. By Jane Lead.
author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.
publisher: printed and sold by J. Bradford, near Crowder's-Well,
notes: [3] p. at end = err. and adv.
Lead's spiritual autobiography in the form of a diary.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
